monster.name: Nergigante
monster.description: A powerful Elder Dragon known for its aggressive nature and ability to regenerate its spikes after they are destroyed.

monster.name: Rathalos
monster.description: Often called the King of the Skies, Rathalos is a fearsome predator capable of raining fire from above.

monster.name: Teostra
monster.description: Teostra is an Elder Dragon that uses intense fire attacks and controls explosions with its fiery mane.

monster.name: Kushala Daora
monster.description: Known for controlling winds, Kushala Daora can create violent storms to deflect attacks.

monster.name: Vaal Hazak
monster.description: A grotesque Elder Dragon with the ability to corrupt its surroundings with poisonous miasma.

monster.name: Legiana
monster.description: A graceful yet deadly flying wyvern that uses cold-based attacks to freeze its prey.

monster.name: Diablos
monster.description: Diablos is an aggressive and territorial monster known for its powerful charges and brutal attacks.

monster.name: Great Jagras
monster.description: A large and slow-moving predator that hunts in packs. It is known for its ability to devour smaller creatures.

monster.name: Anjanath
monster.description: Anjanath is a large, carnivorous wyvern with a long neck and a fearsome fire breath.

monster.name: Barroth
monster.description: Barroth is a formidable monster with a large, armor-like hide that can be used as a weapon in combat.

monster.name: Odogaron
monster.description: A predatory wyvern known for its fast, vicious attacks and terrifying agility.

monster.name: Radobaan
monster.description: An armored creature that rolls into a ball and uses its tough shell for defense.

monster.name: Bazelgeuse
monster.description: Bazelgeuse is a bomb-dropping wyvern known for its explosive attacks and deadly aerial combat skills.

monster.name: Xeno'jiiva
monster.description: An Elder Dragon that appears to have extraterrestrial origins, known for its potent energy attacks.

monster.name: Rathian
monster.description: Rathian, known as the Queen of the Land, uses poison as her primary means of defense and attack.

monster.name: Behemoth
monster.description: A legendary monster from another world, Behemoth is a massive beast with devastating attacks and powerful shockwaves.

monster.name: Zorah Magdaros
monster.description: Zorah Magdaros is a colossal Elder Dragon that exudes magma, threatening to destroy entire regions.

monster.name: Viper Tobi-Kadachi
monster.description: A venomous variant of the Tobi-Kadachi, known for its electrified attacks and agility.

monster.name: Paolumu
monster.description: Paolumu is a flying wyvern with the ability to inflate its body to release gusts of air and create wind-based attacks.

monster.name: Shara Ishvalda
monster.description: Shara Ishvalda is an Elder Dragon that can manipulate the ground, causing earthquakes and disrupting the environment.

monster.name: Lavasioth
monster.description: A fish-like monster that thrives in molten environments, attacking with its powerful tail and volcanic blasts.

monster.name: Pukei-Pukei
monster.description: A colorful wyvern that uses its long tongue and poisonous attacks to defend itself.

monster.name: Tzitzi-Ya-Ku
monster.description: A wyvern that uses its photophores to create blinding flashes of light, stunning prey and predators alike.

monster.name: Kulu-Ya-Ku
monster.description: Kulu-Ya-Ku is known for its ability to dig up rocks or pot-like items to use as shields or weapons.

monster.name: Tigrex
monster.description: A ferocious wyvern with incredible speed and strength, capable of causing devastating damage with its roar.

monster.name: Nargacuga
monster.description: An agile wyvern that uses its tail as a powerful weapon and relies on stealth to ambush prey.

monster.name: Velkhana
monster.description: A graceful Elder Dragon that wields ice-based attacks, creating structures of frost to trap its enemies.

monster.name: Brachydios
monster.description: A brutish wyvern that coats its fists in explosive slime to pummel opponents.

monster.name: Glavenus
monster.description: Glavenus wields its sword-like tail to slash at foes, heating it to searing temperatures for devastating attacks.

monster.name: Kirin
monster.description: Kirin is a mystical Elder Dragon that summons powerful lightning strikes to protect itself and overwhelm hunters.

monster.name: Tobi-Kadachi
monster.description: An electric wyvern that uses its agility to move swiftly through the trees and deliver shocking attacks.

monster.name: Great Girros
monster.description: The leader of the Girros pack, capable of inflicting paralysis with its fangs.

monster.name: Deviljho
monster.description: A terrifying wyvern that devours anything in its path, known as the "World Eater."

monster.name: Azure Rathalos
monster.description: A subspecies of Rathalos with a more aggressive demeanor and enhanced aerial capabilities.

monster.name: Pink Rathian
monster.description: A rare subspecies of Rathian with stronger toxins and increased combat prowess.
